Japanese: なあ、アンナ⏸リーフは今頃どこにいるかな?
Google Translate: Hey, Anna⏸ Where is Leaf now?

Japanese: シッ! やつらに聞かれてしまうわ
Google Translate: Shh! They'll ask me.

Japanese: すまない。⏎わたしとした事が……
Google Translate: Sorry. ⏎What I did...

Japanese: さて……今日はどっちが⏎取りしらべを うけるのかな?
Google Translate: Now...which one will be interrogated today?

Japanese: わたしたちは 何も知らないぞ。⏎取りしらべなどムダな事
Google Translate: We don't know anything. ⏎Useless things such as interrogation

Japanese: それでも やるというなら⏎わたしにしてくれ⏸つまはもう……
Google Translate: If you still want to do it, please do it for me. In the end...

Japanese: なるほど、では女からだ
Google Translate: I see, so it's from a woman.

Japanese: くっ!
Google Translate: Damn!

Japanese: いやなら、わたしが知りたい事に⏎こたえればいいのだ⏸かじ屋のジャードよ⏸おまえはエンドン国王の親友だった
Google Translate: If you don't like it, just answer what I want to know. You're Jard, the trickster. You were King Endon's best friend.

Japanese: それは子どもの頃の話だ⏸わたしが城を出る頃には、エンドンは⏎わたしをうら切り者といった⏸まったく おろかな国王だ
Google Translate: That was when I was a child, and by the time I left the castle, Endon had called me an outcast and was a completely stupid king.

Japanese: われわれを あざむこうとする⏎いつわりではないのかな?
Google Translate: They're trying to deceive us ⏎Maybe it's just a lie?

Japanese: わたしには そんな事をする理由がない
Google Translate: I have no reason to do that.

Japanese: 国のあちらこちらで 影の大王様への⏎うら切りが ほうこくされている⏸ちゅうじつな しもべたちが たおされ⏎大切な宝がぬすみ出された⏸それを行っているのは少年と大人。⏎そしてカラスをつれた小むすめ
Google Translate: In many parts of the country, grievances are being made against the Great King of Shadows. Innocent servants have been defeated, and precious treasures have been stolen. Who is doing this? boys and adults. ⏎And a little girl with a crow

Japanese: ……小むすめ?
Google Translate: ...Little girl?

Japanese: 小むすめは どうでもよい⏸しかし、少年は⏎おまえの息子ではないのか?⏸そして大人とは……⏎エンドン国王ではないのか?⏸おまえは息子を王とともに⏎送り出した⏸足の悪い自分のかわりにな
Google Translate: The little girl doesn't care ⏸ But isn't the boy ⏎ your son? ⏸ And the adult... ⏎ Isn't it King Endon? ⏸ You sent your son ⏎ away with the king ⏸ to replace your lame self. Nana

Japanese: エンドン国王!?⏎ワハハハハハ!
Google Translate: King Endon!?⏎Wahahahahaha!

Japanese: 何がおかしい!
Google Translate: What's wrong!

Japanese: グワッ……
Google Translate: Guwah...

Japanese: あなた!
Google Translate: you!

Japanese: 父さん、元気にしていますか?
Google Translate: Dad, how are you doing?

Japanese: ぼくたちは『うごめく砂』で、⏎ラピスラズリを手に入れました。⏎宝石は4つ取りもどしました。⏎⏎次は『きょうふの山』へ向かっています。
Google Translate: We obtained ⏎Lapis Lazuli from ``Moving Sand''. ⏎I got 4 jewels back. ⏎⏎Next, we are heading to ``Kyofu Mountain.''

Japanese: でも……ああ、父さん。⏎道のりは思っていたより遠く……⏎ぼくたちのノドはカラカラです。⏎⏎ツバもでません。⏎水……水……
Google Translate: But... oh, dad. ⏎The road is further than we expected...⏎Our throats are parched. ⏎⏎There is no spittle. ⏎Water...Water...

Japanese: このままだと死ぬな
Google Translate: I won't die if this continues

Japanese: はっきり言うわね
Google Translate: I'll say it clearly

Japanese: 水をもっと大切にすべきだった。⏎まったく、不用意だった
Google Translate: I should have valued water more. ⏎It was totally careless.

Japanese: だれが?
Google Translate: Who?

Japanese: オレという事にしておこう
Google Translate: Let's just say it's me

Japanese: ねえ、これは……
Google Translate: Hey, this is...

Japanese: 井戸ではなさそうだ
Google Translate: It doesn't seem to be a well.

Japanese: おはか?
Google Translate: Morning?

Japanese: 見て!⏎ジョーカーって書いてあるよ!
Google Translate: Look! ⏎It says Joker!

Japanese: どう見ても10年はたっているな
Google Translate: No matter how you look at it, 10 years have passed.

Japanese: それじゃあ、ジョーカーは⏎死んでいるって事?
Google Translate: So, does that mean the Joker is ⏎dead?

Japanese: わたしたちが会った男は⏎ニセジョーカーだったのね!⏸死んだ人の名前を使うなんて⏎なんて悪人なの!
Google Translate: The man we met was ⏎a fake Joker! ⏸What an evil person to use the name of a dead person!

Japanese: でも、ジョーカーは ぼくたちを⏎助けてくれた……
Google Translate: But Joker ⏎helped us...

Japanese: わたしたちに近づくためよ。⏎影の大王の手下ね。きまり
Google Translate: To get closer to us. ⏎A minion of the Great Shadow King. Kimari

Japanese: そうかな……
Google Translate: I guess so...

Japanese: ここで話していても⏎けつろんは出ない
Google Translate: Even if we talk here, ⏎ there will be no conclusion.

Japanese: (にげた……)
Google Translate: (Nigeta...)

Japanese: 少なくとも このはかから⏎水は出ない
Google Translate: At least there's no water coming out of this basement.

Japanese: それもそうね
Google Translate: That's also true

Japanese: (いいんだろうか……もっと⏎考えなくて……)
Google Translate: (I wonder if it's okay... I don't have to think about it more...)

Japanese: (ダメだ……ノドがかわいて⏎考えられない……)
Google Translate: (No... my throat is so cute⏎I can't think...)

Japanese: リーフ、ジャスミン
Google Translate: leaf, jasmine

Japanese: オレは これまでの人生で⏎こんなにノドがかわいた事はない
Google Translate: I have never felt so dry in my life.

Japanese: わざわざ せんげんしないでよ
Google Translate: Don't bother to worry about it

Japanese: オレが言いたいのは……⏎もう限界だという事だ
Google Translate: What I want to say is...⏎I've reached my limit.

Japanese: カー!
Google Translate: car!

Japanese: この先に泉があるって!
Google Translate: There's a spring ahead!

Japanese: やった!
Google Translate: Yay!

Japanese: 元気になったみたい
Google Translate: Looks like you're feeling better

Japanese: わかりやすいよね
Google Translate: It's easy to understand

Japanese: おい! 水だ! 助かったぞ!
Google Translate: Hey! Water! You saved me!

Japanese: ねえ、リーフ。⏎ここの木、へんだと思わない?
Google Translate: Hey, Leaf. ⏎Don't you think this tree is strange?

Japanese: うん。全部同じ形だ
Google Translate: Yeah. all have the same shape

Japanese: おい、どうした?⏎早く水をのめよ
Google Translate: Hey, what's wrong? ⏎ Quickly drink some water.

Japanese: 木はへんだけど⏎水は安全みたいだね
Google Translate: Trees are bad, but ⏎water seems safe.

Japanese: キン……本物のキンか?
Google Translate: Kin...is it real Kin?

Japanese: 大むかしにいなくなったと⏎聞いているけど……
Google Translate: I heard that he disappeared a long time ago...

Japanese: しつれいな。ここにおるわい
Google Translate: It's annoying. I'm here

Japanese: やっぱり本物だ!
Google Translate: It's real after all!

Japanese: まだ言うか……まあ良い
Google Translate: Should I say it yet...well, it's good

Japanese: ところでおまえたち、からだに⏎かわった事はないか?
Google Translate: By the way, have you noticed any changes in your body?

Japanese: べつに……
Google Translate: Except...

Japanese: どうやら悪人ではないようだな
Google Translate: Apparently he's not a bad person

Japanese: どういう事ですか?
Google Translate: What do you mean?

Japanese: ここの水は ふしぎな力を⏎もっておる⏸心悪しき者がのむと⏎たちまち木にかわってしまうのだ
Google Translate: The water here has a mysterious power, and if an evil person drinks it, it will instantly turn into a tree.

Japanese: そう、ここの木は すべて⏎もとは人間だった……
Google Translate: Yes, all the trees here were originally humans...

Japanese: (知ってたの?)
Google Translate: (Did you know?)

Japanese: (知っていたらのむものか)
Google Translate: (Would I drink it if I knew?)

Japanese: (なんて不用心なの!?)
Google Translate: (How careless are you!?)

Japanese: (結果がすべてだ)
Google Translate: (Results are everything)

Japanese: さあ、ノドをうるおしたなら⏎この泉から立ち去ってくれ⏸人間とかかわると⏎ろくな事がない
Google Translate: Now, if you've quenched your throat, ⏎get away from this fountain.⏎When you interact with humans, ⏎things don't go well.

Japanese: かんげいされていないね
Google Translate: You're not paying attention to it.

Japanese: どっちにしても⏎ゆっくりなんてできないでしょ?
Google Translate: Either way, you can't take it slow, right?

Japanese: あれを見ろ……
Google Translate: Look at that...

Japanese: ……あれが きょうふの山?
Google Translate: ...Is that Kyofu Mountain?

Japanese: おそらくな
Google Translate: Probably

Japanese: 水をのんだら長居は無用。⏎さっさと出発だ
Google Translate: There's no need to stay long after drinking water. ⏎Let's leave quickly

Japanese: 山登りか……
Google Translate: Climbing a mountain...

Japanese: しかたがないわよ。⏎ツバサがあるわけじゃないもの
Google Translate: I have no choice. ⏎Things that don't have wings

Japanese: (ジャスミン……バルダが)
Google Translate: (Jasmine... Barda)

Japanese: (うん、何か良くない事を考えてるわね)
Google Translate: (Yeah, you're thinking about something bad.)

Japanese: オレにまかせろ
Google Translate: Leave it to me

Japanese: おねがいします、長老。⏎このとおりです!
Google Translate: Please, Elder. ⏎This is it!

Japanese: ならん! それはならん!
Google Translate: That's not true! That's not true!

Japanese: そこをなんとか!
Google Translate: Do something about that!

Japanese: あなたたち、こんなところへ⏎なにをしにきたの?
Google Translate: You guys, what did you come to this place for?

Japanese: ぼくたちは きょうふの山へ⏎行きたいんだ
Google Translate: We want to go to Kyofu Mountain⏎

Japanese: あの山……むかしはいいところだったわ
Google Translate: That mountain... it was a nice place once upon a time.

Japanese: きみたちは影の憲兵団とは⏎かんけいないんだよな?
Google Translate: You guys don't get along well with the Shadow Military Police Corps, do you?

Japanese: きょうふの山へ行きたいんだって?⏎それはまたどうして?
Google Translate: Do you want to go to Kyofu Mountain?⏎Why is that?

Japanese: 理由は言えないけど……
Google Translate: I can't tell you the reason, but...

Japanese: ははーん。⏎ブーロンの実を食べたいんだな⏸それはぼくたちも同じさ。⏎ここの草は、もううんざり
Google Translate: Haha. ⏎You want to eat Boron fruit⏸That's the same for us too. ⏎I'm tired of the grass here.

Japanese: どうしてそのブーロンの実を⏎食べないの?
Google Translate: Why don't you eat that boulong fruit?

Japanese: そりゃあんた。⏎あのあたりにはグノメ族がいるからね⏸やつらの どく矢に当たったら⏎ひとたまりもないんだ
Google Translate: That's you. ⏎There are Gnomes around there⏸If you get hit by their poison arrows⏎You won't even get a chance.

Japanese: グノメ族? どく矢?
Google Translate: Gnomes? Dokuya?

Japanese: ああ。やつらのせいで仲間が⏎たったこれだけに……
Google Translate: ah. Because of them, my friends are only ⏎...

Japanese: ブーロンの実を食べたい……
Google Translate: I want to eat Boron fruit...

Japanese: ブーロンの実?
Google Translate: Boulong fruit?

Japanese: わたしたちの一番好きな食べものよ。⏎とってもおいしいの
Google Translate: It's our favorite food. ⏎It's very delicious

Japanese: ブーロンの実を食べたい……
Google Translate: I want to eat Boron fruit...

Japanese: グノメ族のせいで⏎食べられなくなったんだね?
Google Translate: Because of the Gnome tribe, you can't eat ⏎, right?

Japanese: そうなのよ。⏎いまいましいったらありゃしない⏸キンは本当ならあそこに住むのが⏎一番いいのよ⏸きけんかもしれないけど、わたしは⏎帰るべきだと思うわ
Google Translate: That's right. ⏎If it's a damn thing, I won't be able to do it.⏸If it's true, it's best for Kin to live there.⏸It might be a disaster, but I think ⏎I should go home.

Japanese: どうしてそうしないの?
Google Translate: Why not?

Japanese: 長老が大反对なの⏸これ以上キンがへったら⏎本当にほろんでしまうってね⏸キンの子どもはプリンだけだから⏎長老の心配もわかるけど……⏸あら? そう言えばプリンはどこ?
Google Translate: The elder is very rebellious ⏸ If Kin gets any worse ⏎ He'll really fall apart ⏸ Kin's only child is Jigglypuff ⏎ I can understand the elder's concern, but... ⏸ Oh? By the way, where's Jigglypuff?

Japanese: だいじょうぶよ。⏎リーフは無害だから
Google Translate: It's okay. ⏎Leaf is harmless
(harmless……)

Japanese: こんにちは、リーフ
Google Translate: Hello Leaf

Japanese: やあ、こんにちは。⏎おとなたちが心配していたよ
Google Translate: Hello, hello. ⏎Adults were worried

Japanese: もう、いやになっちゃう。⏎みんなで わたしを子どもあつかい
Google Translate: I'm starting to hate it. ⏎Everyone treats me like a child

Japanese: そう、子どもあつかいは⏎はらが立つわよね!
Google Translate: That's right, you're being treated like a child ⏎ It makes you angry!

Japanese: そうよ⏸わたしだってブーロンの実を⏎食べてみたいわ⏸でも、きけんだからって⏎ブーロンの森へ行かせてもらえないの⏸グノメ族がなによ!⏎どく矢がなによ!
Google Translate: That's right⏸I also want to eat the Booron fruit⏎But they won't let me go to the Booron Forest just because I'm in trouble⏸What's wrong with the Gnome tribe!⏎What's with the Poison Arrow!

Japanese: おまえたち!
Google Translate: You guys!

Japanese: ウワサの少年少女か!?
Google Translate: Are they the rumored boys and girls?

Japanese: (ぼくたちを さがしているのか?⏎それなら だまっていた方が……)
Google Translate: (Are you looking for us? ⏎In that case, it's better to remain silent...)

Japanese: そうだったら、なによ!
Google Translate: If so, then what!

Japanese: つかまえれば 大てがらだ!
Google Translate: If you catch it, it's big!

Japanese: こないで!
Google Translate: Don't come!

Japanese: 悪者を たおしてくれたのね!
Google Translate: You defeated the bad guy!

Japanese: 強いのね!
Google Translate: You're strong!

Japanese: 憲兵団なんて、かんたんよ
Google Translate: Military police corps is easy.

Japanese: たのもしいのね⏸そうだわ。わたしたちの大切な⏎プリンを助けてもらった おれいを……
Google Translate: It's fun⏸That's right. My heart goes out to her who saved our precious ⏎pudding...

Japanese: そんな……
Google Translate: Like that...

Japanese: (チャンスよ、リーフ)
Google Translate: (Here's your chance, Leaf)

Japanese: わたしたち、きょうふの山へ行きたいの
Google Translate: We want to go to Kyofu Mountain

Japanese: 知っているわ。あなたたちの⏎仲間が長老に たのんでいるもの⏸でも、無理でしょうね。⏎長老はガンコだから……
Google Translate: I know. Even if your ⏎friends are asking their elders⏸ to do it, it probably won't be possible. ⏎Because the elder is stubborn...

Japanese: 山まで はこんでくれるだけでいいのに
Google Translate: I wish you could just take me to the mountain.

Japanese: ……待っていて
Google Translate: ...wait for me

Japanese: さっきは わたしだけ にげて⏎ごめんなさい
Google Translate: I was the only one who ran away earlier⏎I'm sorry

Japanese: 気にしない気にしない!
Google Translate: I don't care, I don't care!

Japanese: さあ、おなかのふくろにはいって
Google Translate: Come on, put it in your tummy bag

Japanese: はこんでくれるの?
Google Translate: Will you come in?

Japanese: おれいはしなくちゃ。⏎長老にはナイショよ
Google Translate: I have to do it. ⏎Keep it a secret from the elders

Japanese: わたしも行っていい?
Google Translate: Can I go too?

Japanese: ダメよ。おとなしく待っていて
Google Translate: No. wait quietly

Japanese: 長老め……ガンコにもほどがある……
Google Translate: Elder... there's a limit to your stubbornness...

Japanese: さあ、バルダ、乗って乗って
Google Translate: Come on, Barda, ride, ride

Japanese: これはどういう事だ!?
Google Translate: What does this mean!?

Japanese: きょうふの山まで はこんでくれるって
Google Translate: It is said that it will take you to the mountain of Kyofu.

Japanese: オレの苦労は……
Google Translate: My hardships...

Japanese: (話はあと!⏎長老に ばれたら たいへんよ)
Google Translate: (Let's talk later!⏎It would be a big deal if the elders found out)

Japanese: うむ……
Google Translate: Hmm...

Japanese: ああ、イヤな予感がする。⏎人間とかかわってしまった……
Google Translate: Ah, I have a bad feeling. ⏎I got involved with a human...

Japanese: おかげでグノメ族とは なんとか⏎うまくやっている⏸すぐに 仲良くするのは⏎無理だがな……
Google Translate: Thanks to you, I'm getting along well with the Gnome tribe, although it's impossible for me to become friends right away...

Japanese: わたしたちにとって あの山は⏎とてもすばらしい ばしょだったの⏸そう、むかしはね……
Google Translate: For us, that mountain was ⏎a very wonderful place⏸Yes, once upon a time...

Japanese: もう、ブーロンの実は⏎食べほうだい!⏸あなたたちには とっても⏎かんしゃしてるのよ
Google Translate: It's time to eat the Boolon fruit! I'm really angry at you guys.

Japanese: はあ……グノメ族が山から⏎出て行ってくれないかしら
Google Translate: Sigh...I wonder if the Gnomes will leave the mountain.

Japanese: キンはこれから どんどん⏎ふえるわよ!⏸あなたたちのおかげよ
Google Translate: The number of Kin will continue to increase from now on! It's all thanks to you guys!

Japanese: 空を とびたいのか?⏎ひゃーっ!と とびたいのか?
Google Translate: Do you want to fly through the sky? Do you want to jump and say “hiya!”?

Japanese: こわかったけど 楽しかったな。⏎また、ぼうけんしたいな!
Google Translate: It was scary, but it was fun. ⏎I want to go crazy again!

Japanese: 父さん。⏎キンと出会った事だけでもスゴイのに⏎乗せてもらえるなんて……
Google Translate: Dad. ⏎Meeting Kin was amazing, but to be given a ride...

Japanese: おい、山が近づいてきたぞ
Google Translate: Hey, the mountain is approaching

Japanese: きゃっ!
Google Translate: Yay!

Japanese: どうしたの?
Google Translate: what happened?

Japanese: グノメ族の矢が とんできたわ!
Google Translate: The arrow of the Gnome tribe has landed!

Japanese: 下画面をタッチすると わたしが空たかく⏎まい上がるわよ⏸ついらくに気をつけて タイミングよく⏎下画面をタッチしてね!
Google Translate: If you touch the bottom screen, I'll fly up into the air⏎Be careful and touch the bottom screen at the right time!

Japanese: よーし⏎なんとか とび越えたよ!⏸ボクがんばっちゃった。⏎てへ
Google Translate: Alright⏎I managed to get over it!⏸I did my best. ⏎Tehe

Japanese: キンのひこう⏎⏎下画面をタッチするとじょうしょうする⏎なにもしないと おちてしまうぞ⏎タイミングよく⏎キンをはばたかせろ!
Google Translate: Kin's Flying ⏎⏎Touch the bottom screen and it will fly ⏎If you don't do anything, you'll fall ⏎Good timing⏎Make Kin fly!

Japanese: 下画面をタッチすると⏎じょうしょうするぞ!
Google Translate: If you touch the bottom screen, ⏎ will work!

Japanese: ごめんなさい。⏎これ以上は進めない
Google Translate: sorry. ⏎I can't proceed any further.

Japanese: どうするの?
Google Translate: What should I do?

Japanese: 安全なばしょがあるから⏎そこにおりるわ
Google Translate: There's a safe place, so I'll go there.

Japanese: さあ、ブーロンの木よ
Google Translate: Come on, Boorong tree

Japanese: ひさしぶりだー!
Google Translate: It’s been a while!

Japanese: おみやげ、たくさん持って帰りましょ!
Google Translate: Let's take home lots of souvenirs!

Japanese: キンたちよ、このれいは いずれ……
Google Translate: Dear Kin, this beauty will eventually...

Japanese: さあ、帰りましょう!
Google Translate: Now, let's go home!

Japanese: 長老、怒ってるかな?
Google Translate: Elder, are you angry?

Japanese: 人間たちに おどされたって言えばいいわ
Google Translate: You can say that the humans scared you.

Japanese: (ひどい……)
Google Translate: (terrible……)

Japanese: ……悪者になってくれる?
Google Translate: ...Will you be the bad guy?

Japanese: ……しかたがないな
Google Translate: ...I have no choice.

Japanese: ありがとう!⏎みんな、気をつけてね!
Google Translate: Thank you! ⏎ Everyone, please be careful!

Japanese: キンって意外と……
Google Translate: Kin is surprisingly...

Japanese: おたがいさま!
Google Translate: Thank you!

Japanese: さあ、行こう⏸オレたちがもくてきを はたせば⏎もっと仲良くなれるさ
Google Translate: Come on, let's go ⏸ If we work hard ⏎ we'll become even better friends.

Japanese: プリン、どうしたの!?
Google Translate: Pudding, what happened!?

Japanese: おい、どく矢がささっているぞ!
Google Translate: Hey, there's a poison arrow!

Japanese: たいへん!⏎この子はキンのさいごの子どもなのよ!
Google Translate: That's a big deal!⏎This child is Kin's last child!

Japanese: ジャスミン、ユリのミツは⏎まだあるのかい?
Google Translate: Jasmine, do you still have lily honey?

Japanese: そうだわ!
Google Translate: That's right!

Japanese: さいごの……とっておきのユリのミツで⏎プリンは元気になりました。
Google Translate: Finally... ⏎Puddin became energetic with the special lily nectar.

Google Translate: Why do you call me my father's name?

Japanese: なるほど! さすがは大王様⏸今ごろ おまえの両親は⏎取りしらべを うけているはずだぞ⏸きびしい、きびしい 取りしらべをな!
Google Translate: I see! As expected of the Great King⏸Your parents should have been interrogated by now⏎Severe, severe interrogation!

Japanese: リーフ、耳をふさげ!⏎今は戦うしかない!
Google Translate: Leaf, cover your ears!⏎Now we have no choice but to fight!

Japanese: リーフ、やりましょう!
Google Translate: Leaf, let's do it!

Japanese: それがいい。⏎オレ様に てがらを立てさせてくれ!
Google Translate: That's good. ⏎Let me make her hair stand up!

Japanese: やったわね!
Google Translate: You did it!

Japanese: エメラルドだな!
Google Translate: It's an emerald!

Japanese: リーフ……
Google Translate: Leaf...

Japanese: ゲリックがいない日がやってきた。⏎ゆめのようだわ
Google Translate: The day came when Gerrick was gone. ⏎It's like a dream

Japanese: なんと れいを言っていいのやら……
Google Translate: What a beautiful thing to say...

Japanese: れいはいらない。⏎しかし約束してほしい事がある
Google Translate: I don't need Rei. ⏎However, there is something I want you to promise me.

Japanese: おお、なんなりと
Google Translate: Oh, just like that

Japanese: オレたちの事はだれにも⏎言わないでほしい
Google Translate: Please don't tell anyone about us.

Japanese: もちろんじゃとも
Google Translate: Of course not

Japanese: それから……もうキンを殺すな
Google Translate: And...don't kill Kin again.

Japanese: キンをかる事は わたしたちの⏎一番楽しいあそびなんだよ
Google Translate: Picking up gold is our ⏎most fun game.

Japanese: その結果、山からキンが⏎いなくなった⏸ブーロンの木を食べる者が⏎いなくなったせいで山はどうなった?
Google Translate: As a result, Kin ⏎ disappeared from the mountain ⏸ What happened to the mountain because the people who ate the Boorong tree ⏎ disappeared?

Japanese: たしかに……あの、いまいましい木に⏎山は おおいつくされてしまった
Google Translate: Indeed...that damn tree has completely taken over the ⏎mountain.

Japanese: な?⏸キンはこの山に必要な生き物だ
Google Translate: Huh?⏸Kin is a necessary creature on this mountain.

Japanese: グノメ族とキンは山でくらす⏎大切な仲間なのよ⏸狩るだなんてとんでもないわ!
Google Translate: The Gnome tribe and Kin live in the mountains⏎They are important friends⏸It's outrageous that they hunt!

Japanese: うーむ……
Google Translate: Hmm...

Japanese: なんでも約束すると言ったよな?
Google Translate: I said I'd promise anything, right?

Japanese: うむ。わかった。⏎一族のほこりにかけて約束する
Google Translate: Hmm. Understood. ⏎I promise by the dust of my family

Japanese: グノメ族は キンを殺さない
Google Translate: The Gnomes don't kill Kin.

Japanese: プリン、やったね!
Google Translate: Pudding, you did it!

Japanese: うん!
Google Translate: Yeah!

Japanese: わたしたちも約束してほしい
Google Translate: I want you to promise us too.

Japanese: なんだ?
Google Translate: What?

Japanese: グノメの力が必要な時は必ず言ってくれ⏸山を かけ下り、はせ参じよう
Google Translate: When you need Gnome's power, be sure to tell me ⏸ Let's run down the mountain and climb the mountain.

Japanese: ……その日はきっと来る。⏎こちらこそ、たのんだぞ
Google Translate: ...That day will surely come. ⏎Thank you for asking.

Japanese: 約束だ
Google Translate: It's a promise

Japanese: リーフ?
Google Translate: Leaf?

Japanese: 父さんが……母さんが……⏸ぼく、家へ帰らなくちゃ……
Google Translate: My father...my mother...⏸I have to go home...

Japanese: リーフ……
Google Translate: Leaf...

Japanese: 向こうに何かありそうだけど……
Google Translate: It seems like there's something over there...

Japanese: ツタがからまって先に進めそうにないな⏎オノがあれば行けそうだが……
Google Translate: I can't seem to move forward because I'm tangled in the vines ⏎I think I could go if I had an ax...

Japanese: 引き返しましょ
Google Translate: Let's turn back

Japanese: まって⏎これを使ってみよう
Google Translate: Wait ⏎Let's try this

Japanese: リーフは⏎『#f8ffけっしてさびないオノ#fcff』を使った
Google Translate: For the leaf, I used ⏎“#f8ff ax that never rusts #fcff”

Japanese: 『ジョーカーここにねむる』
Google Translate: "Joker sleeps here"
